General.Name: Toro Energy Ltd
General.Description: Toro Energy Limited engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of uranium properties in Australia. Its flagship project is the Wiluna uranium project located in the northern goldfields region of Western Australia. Toro Energy Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 60 Havelock Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
